A few functions used for creating and manipulating dendritic networks.

### Installation
```{r, warning = FALSE}
# devtools::install_github("flee598/DenMet")
library(DenMet)
```

### create a dendritic network with 10 nodes
```{r}
nwk <- fun_crtNwk(10, "int")
fun_pltNwk(nwk[[1]]$ig)
```
